name: HeckOuttaHere
description:
HeckOuttaHere is a fangambe about the hero Waduheck who wakes up in a dungeon.

Controls:
Space to start
WASD to move

Credits:

Programming and Artwork by Möp
Original Character Waduheck by Poke
Royality Free Music by Lobo Loco, Loyality Freak Music and Podington Bear.
Font: Fette Mikado by Peter Wiegel
